job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Being a Senior Engineer for ourDigital Employee Experience in the AH Retail Tech Platform, meansyou are responsible for all the back-end services of Albert Heijn'semployee app, called '@AH', used by more than 100.000employees.This app has many functionalities, like checking out theAH news, connecting to colleagues via chat, and view workschedules. But even more exciting there's much more on our roadmapfor the upcoming months and years, like GenAI, task management,digital onboarding and training, and scaling to new business unitsand other brands.

   As a passionate SeniorEngineer, you own the realization of new features. You lead theteam in keeping up the high security and coding standards of theplatform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop newfeatures using the latesttechnology.

   Youparticipate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce codequality, develop best practices, write tests and manage thecontinuous integration of code. As a Senior Engineer you supportproduct or platform architects and are the technical point ofcontact for product owners and heads of tech. Beyond your own team,you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner sourceinitiatives, andmore.

   Morespecifically, as Senior Devops Engineeryou :
     * Are the Lead softwareengineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers indeveloping a feature-rich product for ouremployees.
     * Understand how to technically scalethe services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowersthe "@AH app".
     * Understand how to combine bestagile development practices in combination with a services-basedarchitecture.
     * Are an expert on 'your' domain(Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), thoughyou can also liaise with other senior engineers and theirrespective technologies (Front and BackEnd).

   Whywe believe this is a cooljob
     * You get to work withmodern technologies, and since this is a new-build solution we havezero legacy.
     * Everything we build in the app isscalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CDpipelines. We work in small increments so we're able to put thingslive straight away, hence reduce our time tomarket.
     * We work in a multi-disciplinarian team;with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner. In totalthe team consists of 8+ people.
     * Thisinitiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is apriority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling toother brands within Ahold Delhaize.
     * As a Seniorengineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical)part of the app. And the way we work in this project is a blueprintfor other teams in our Retail Tech Platform. Therefore, weencourage you to share knowledge and best practices with otherteams.
       Whatdo you bring
       At AH Technology you'll beworking for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands.To be successful as our new senior back end engineer youbring
job_details.full_text:
Backend Developer

Being a Senior Engineer for ourDigital Employee Experience in the AH Retail Tech Platform, meansyou are responsible for all the back-end services of Albert Heijn'semployee app, called '@AH', used by more than 100.000employees.This app has many functionalities, like checking out theAH news, connecting to colleagues via chat, and view workschedules. But even more exciting there's much more on our roadmapfor the upcoming months and years, like GenAI, task management,digital onboarding and training, and scaling to new business unitsand other brands.

   As a passionate SeniorEngineer, you own the realization of new features. You lead theteam in keeping up the high security and coding standards of theplatform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop newfeatures using the latesttechnology.

   Youparticipate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce codequality, develop best practices, write tests and manage thecontinuous integration of code. As a Senior Engineer you supportproduct or platform architects and are the technical point ofcontact for product owners and heads of tech. Beyond your own team,you contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner sourceinitiatives, andmore.

   Morespecifically, as Senior Devops Engineeryou :
     * Are the Lead softwareengineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers indeveloping a feature-rich product for ouremployees.
     * Understand how to technically scalethe services in the 'employee experience platform', which empowersthe "@AH app".
     * Understand how to combine bestagile development practices in combination with a services-basedarchitecture.
     * Are an expert on 'your' domain(Kotlin back-end services on our Azure Kubernetes platform), thoughyou can also liaise with other senior engineers and theirrespective technologies (Front and BackEnd).

   Whywe believe this is a cooljob
     * You get to work withmodern technologies, and since this is a new-build solution we havezero legacy.
     * Everything we build in the app isscalable, using Azure and Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CDpipelines. We work in small increments so we're able to put thingslive straight away, hence reduce our time tomarket.
     * We work in a multi-disciplinarian team;with dedicated QA, UX designer, developers, product owner. In totalthe team consists of 8+ people.
     * Thisinitiative, building an employee app for your own colleagues, is apriority project for Albert Heijn, with the potential of scaling toother brands within Ahold Delhaize.
     * As a Seniorengineer you have an impact on the direction of the (technical)part of the app. And the way we work in this project is a blueprintfor other teams in our Retail Tech Platform. Therefore, weencourage you to share knowledge and best practices with otherteams.
       Whatdo you bring
       At AH Technology you'll beworking for one of the biggest food retailers in the Netherlands.To be successful as our new senior back end engineer youbring

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend development, software engineering principles, and MLOps practices within a specific domain (employee app). While it mentions 'GenAI' as a future roadmap item, the core responsibilities and required skills described do not align with a specialized GenAI Engineer role. The emphasis is on building and scaling backend services, leading development teams, and maintaining existing infrastructure, which fits more within a general Senior Backend or DevOps Engineer profile. The mention of GenAI is aspirational rather than a current, central requirement of the role.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'back-end services', 'realization of new features', 'develop new features using the latest technology', 'develop code', 'enforce code quality', 'write tests', 'manage the continuous integration of code', 'Lead software engineer, guiding other back- and front-end developers', 'services-based architecture', and 'Kotlin back-end services'. These are all core aspects of traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: responsible for all the back-end services

job_tasks.justification: The role involves leading the team in maintaining high standards and developing new features, which is a key aspect of senior software development.
job_tasks.phrase: own the realization of new features. You lead the team in keeping up the high security and coding standards of the platform, push the engineering skills of the team, and develop new features using the latest technology.

job_tasks.justification: Participating in standups, refinements, developing code, enforcing quality, writing tests, and managing CI are all standard software development lifecycle activities.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in standups and refinements, develop code, enforce code quality, develop best practices, write tests and manage the continuous integration of code.

job_tasks.justification: Being a technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech indicates a role in translating requirements and guiding development, which falls under software development leadership.
job_tasks.phrase: are the technical point of contact for product owners and heads of tech.

job_tasks.justification: The job title 'Senior Devops Engineer' and the mention of 'Azure Kubernetes platform', 'Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines', and 'continuous integration of code' strongly indicate a focus on operations and deployment.
Understanding how to technically scale services and the mention of 'Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines' are core to operations engineering and MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Understand how to technically scale the services in the 'employee experience platform'

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Azure Kubernetes platform' and 'Microservices, Kubernetes, CI / CD pipelines' are key technologies and practices within operations engineering.
The description explicitly mentions 'CI / CD pipelines' and 'Microservices, Kubernetes', which are central to MLOps and operations.

The role involves understanding the business context of the employee app, its functionalities, and future roadmap items like GenAI, task management, and digital onboarding, linking technical work to business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Being a Senior Engineer for our Digital Employee Experience in the AH Retail Tech Platform, means you are responsible for all the back-end services of Albert Heijn's employee app, called '@AH', used by more than 100.000 employees.

job_tasks.justification: Although not the primary focus, the roadmap includes 'GenAI', indicating potential future involvement with generative models.

contribute to the AH Tech community via Guilds, inner source initiatives
own the realization of new features

Understand how to technically scale the services
